title: Do people actually post how they feel about things?
body:
Cause I feel like many people post things they don't mean. They are just trying to aspire to be edgy/trolly/notorious to a random collective of people in a way that makes no difference to anyones' actual lives In order to feed their egos.

Humans are truly fragile creatures.... but when you give them annonymity with zero accountability for their actions they turn into terrible people. 

Either that or people propagate reciprocal altruism ie "circlejerking"

I don't really know why I post on GD, but I do know I always post what I think... no more no less.
